summary: Build a simple, beginner-friendly, lightweight Android-first mobile app for a home-based saree business (Suvarna Collection) targeting Indian women, featuring a catalog with WhatsApp ordering, offers/new arrivals, and contact info in an elegant Indian design theme.
architectural_notes: Android-first lightweight mobile app; prioritize simple, beginner-friendly UX
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal elegant logo with a gold and maroon motif, no text (suvarna-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Subtle Indian textile pattern background, warm neutral tones (textile-pattern.dim_1440x2560.png)
- Square product placeholder image resembling a folded saree on a neutral background (saree-placeholder-1.dim_800x800.png)
- Square product placeholder image with a different saree colorway on a neutral background (saree-placeholder-2.dim_800x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create an Android-first, lightweight, beginner-friendly mobile web app UI for the saree business named “Suvarna Collection”, including a Home screen that shows the business name and an English tagline.
Implement a Saree Catalog screen that lists products with: image, name, price, fabric, and occasion, and supports opening a Product Details view (or an expanded card) for each product.

Add a “WhatsApp Order” button for each product that opens WhatsApp using a wa.me link with a pre-filled English message including the product name and price, and uses a configurable business WhatsApp/phone number.
Create an “Offers” section and a “New Arrivals” section that show relevant products (or dedicated items) and are accessible from navigation and/or the Home screen.
Create a Contact page that shows a phone number and a location (as text) and provides tap-friendly actions (e.g., click-to-call and an external maps link). Keep all user-facing text in English.
Apply a simple, elegant Indian design theme suitable for Indian women, using a cohesive color palette (avoid blue/purple), typography, and UI components consistently across all screens.
Persist and serve catalog/products (including offer/new-arrival markers) from the single Motoko backend actor, and fetch them from the frontend using React Query.
Add generated static brand/product placeholder images into the app and render them from the frontend as static assets (do not serve images through the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Home screen showing business name (Suvarna Collection) and a tagline
Saree catalog with product fields (image, name, price, fabric, occasion)
WhatsApp order button for each product in the catalog
Contact page with phone number and location
Simple, elegant Indian design theme optimized for Indian women; lightweight/beginner-friendly UX
